load3DS.cpp [code]Loads 3DS object from file Uses lib3DS to load 3D objects/scenes: http://code.google.com/p/lib3ds/
loadScene.cpp [code]Loads entire scene from 3DS file using lib3ds: http://code.google.com/p/lib3ds/
main.cpp [code]Entry point template for application. Creates windows using SDL, then initializes scene, sets render loop and receives mouse and keyboard events from user. This template shows very basic usage of framework
material.cpp [code]Material settings, dynamic shader creation
material.h [code]Material settings, dynamic shader creation
material_generator.cpp [code]Dynamic shader creation

render_target.cpp [code]Handles rendering to texture/cube maps for dynamic reflections/refractions
scene.cpp [code]Initialization and drawing the scene - definitions
scene.h [code]Initialization and drawing the scene - declarations
shadow.cpp [code]Shadow mapping algoritmus
shadow.h [code]Settings for shadows
texture.cpp [code]Load TGA textures from file and converts them to suitable OpenGL format. TGA files can be compressed or uncompressed Loading TGA texture code adapted from: http://nehe.gamedev.net/data/lessons/lesson.asp?lesson=33
texture.h [code]Load TGA textures from file and converts them to suitable OpenGL format. TGA files can be compressed or uncompressed
timer.h [code]Timer class which measures time with precision in microseconds
utils.hpp [code]Various utilities, mostly from OpenGL forums
